text: "Assassin" is a song by English band Muse, released on their 2006 album Black Holes and Revelations. The song peaked at number 6 on 7digital's charts in the final week of 2006.http://www.techdigest.tv/2007/01/muse_leona_and.html The song is featured on the video game Guitar Hero World Tour. Drummer Dominic Howard provides the heavy metal flavor to the song, while retaining the signature Muse sound. Sputnikmusic wrote that Howard's drumming on the song "is the best on the album, and is probably the best he's ever done."https://www.sputnikmusic.com/review/8092/Muse-Black-Holes--Revelations/ While "Assassin" was performed frequently before its release on the US Campus Invasion Tour 2005, it was a much rarer song on the Black Holes and Revelations Tour, and has only made occasional appearances in years since. The song's intro was performed on the Simulation Theory World Tour as part of a medley with ""Stockholm Syndrome", "New Born", "Reapers", and "The Handler". == References == Black Holes and Revelations Category:2006 songs Category:Songs written by Matt Bellamy
